name: Predator Pro Gloves
description: Designed to perform in all the right places. These adidas Predator goalkeeper gloves have a silicone Zone Skin coating on their adaptive knit backhand to help you clear the ball. Protected by an abrasion zone on the lateral side, the top-quality URG 2.0 palm offers extended grip and cushioning. A strapless, compressive entry keeps the fit feeling natural.
specifications: Negative cut
Body: 91% polyester, 8% elastane, 1% nylon plain knit
Palm: URG 2.0 100% rubber foam
Anatomical flex zones
Zone Skin on fingers and backhand

name: Predator Match Gloves
description: Designed to perform in all the right places. Made for matches and training sessions, these adidas Predator goalkeeper gloves have a durable Soft Grip Pro palm for match-turning grip and comfortable cushioning during whatever conditions Mother Nature throws at you. At the wrist, a fixed, full-wrap strap locks you in for confident keeping.
specifications: Half-negative cut
Body: 63% polyester, 37% polyurethane
Palm: Soft Grip Pro 100% rubber foam
Elastic bandage

name: X Training Gloves
description: Head. Hands. Feet. As soccer gets faster, your goalkeeping game has to flow. These adidas X Training Gloves remove distractions with a lightweight build and an elasticized, strapless entry. Breathable and flexible, the mesh backhand ensures every movement feels natural. On the palm, Soft Grip latex keeps you ahead of the game.
specifications: Negative cut
Palm: Soft Grip 100% rubber foam
Body: 63% polyester, 37% polyurethane
Elastic bandage

name: Nike Goalkeeper Match Gloves
description: The Nike Goalkeeper Match Gloves are ready to make every save. Soft padding provides cushioning against shots, while a smooth surface gives you grip in wet or dry conditions.
specifications: Foam on the palm provides plush cushioning and impact absorption.
Mesh panels allow airflow to help keep your hands cool.
Smooth surface on the palm helps you grip the ball better.
Adjustable wrist strap and reverse stitching on the back hand create a secure fit.
40% polyester/33% latex/21% EVA/6% nylon

name: Future Z Grip 1 Hybrid Goalkeeper Gloves
description: Keep your eye on the ball and all eyes on you. From the all-new FUTURE Z collection, these goalkeeper gloves make sure your gear is on point from head to toe. The high-tech FUTURE Z Grip 1 Hybrid Goalkeeper Gloves are engineered to give you maximum freedom of movement and fantastic grip on the ball â€“ all with a dynamic, eye-catching design.
specifications: Hybrid palm cut provides additional grip and improved fit
4 mm ELITE+ grip Latex with extra-sticky material for grip in all weather conditions
Thumb wrap increases Latex-to-ball contact
Knit/fabric backhand for excellent fit, reactivity and comfort
44% Latex 55% PES 1% PU

name: Ultra Grip 1 Hybrid Pro Goalkeeper Gloves
description: You asked and we answered. Our ULTRA line is designed to meet and exceed every need of the modern goalkeeper. From breathability to fit and grip, we've packed these gloves with technology to ensure the highest performance on the market. We used our exclusive GRDXKN print to deliver the lightest weight, fastest and most flexible gloves out there. Our ULTRA Grip 1 Hybrid Pro Goalkeeper Gloves feature a 4 mm superior grip latex palm made of 90% renewable raw materials to deliver exceptional grip in both wet and dry conditions, and the reduced weight body material amplifies comfort and breathability. For performance you can rely on.
specifications: Gunn/negative-mixed palm cut provides additional grip and improved fit
PUMA exclusive GRDKXN punching zone provides perfect ball control when punching
Twin-wrap thumb and latex gussets maximise latex-to-ball contact even when fingers are twisted
Weight-reduced body material for highest wearing comfort and breathability
SHELL: 55% polyester, 44% latex, 1% polyurethane
